entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as laughing so hard that he had to hold onto a fence to keep himself standing.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as trying to wipe his hair clean and staring wildly around.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is described as looking scared and having bulging muscles that were no use against ghosts.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is described as looking scared and trying to rub out a foul-smelling substance from his eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as sneaking along the path and yielding some foul-smelling, green sludge.

relationships.description: Ron was laughing at Malfoy's reaction to the ghost.
Crabbe and Goyle were looking scared together.
Harry yielded some foul-smelling, green sludge.
Goyle got splattered with the foul-smelling substance.
